files.description: CLI-driven deterministic pipeline that seeds RNGs, pins naming, writes outputs/results.json and outputs/figure.png, and validates against a fixed artifact schema.
Defines the fixed JSON artifact schema (expected keys/types/required fields) and provides validation helpers used by the pipeline and tests.
Deterministic plotting utilities that generate outputs/figure.png with consistent styling, sizing, and data ordering.
End-to-end test that runs the pipeline and asserts exact JSON keys/fields exist and that numeric values fall within specified tolerances while ensuring figure.png is created.
Project configuration with pinned dependency versions and test tooling configuration to support reproducible runs.
Fully pinned lockfile-style requirements list to enforce deterministic dependency versions in environments that use pip install -r.
Documentation describing the artifact contract (schema and filenames), how determinism is enforced via seeding and pinned deps, and how to run the pipeline and tests.

missionDescription: Define a fixed artifact schema (e.g., outputs/results.json + outputs/figure.png) and enforce determinism via explicit RNG seeding, pinned dependency versions, and consistent naming; add a test asserting exact keys/fields exist and values are within expected tolerances.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Deterministic execution (fixed seed, fixed schemas, fixed filenames) enables stable regression tests and repeatable end-to-end pipeline runs, directly supporting the requirement to execute and persist...
